name: All-Knowing Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Alberich's Bracers
How to Acquire:
Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyendell Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Astrologer Gloves
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Azur's Manchettes
How to Acquire:
After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Manchettes will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Manchettes
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.        Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. After that, you will have to kill him for his Bell Bearing. 
Elden Ring Map here        Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing

name: Beast Champion Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackflame Monk Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Drop from Blackflame monks.

name: Bloodhound Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Bloodsoaked Manchettes
How to Acquire:
Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Briar Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

name: Bull-Goat Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.
 Elden Ring Map here

name: Carian Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Elden Ring Map here        To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

name: Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal√©. It costs  1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Champion Bracers
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Cleanrot Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Drops from non-boss versions of Cleanrot Knights, found at Inner Aeonia and Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Confessor Gloves
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Gauntlets
Special Effect: Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis, located at Auriza Hero's Grave. 
Elden Ring Map here        Found with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Elden Lord Bracers
How to Acquire: Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Exile Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Drop from Exile Soldiers.

name: Errant Sorcerer Manchettes
How to Acquire:
Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Monk Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Foot Soldier Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldier-type Soldier enemies. Defeat a Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Foot Soldiers can be found protecting the Purified Ruins.

name: Gelmir Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Godrick Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Fort Haight.: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

name: Godskin Apostle Bracelets
How to Acquire:
Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Haligtree Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Highwayman Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

name: Hoslow's Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.        Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Kaiden Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

name: Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for  3,000 Runes.

name: Land of Reeds Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.        Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.        Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets
How to Acquire: May drop from Knights in Leyndell Royal Capital.

name: Lionel's Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Malformed Dragon Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Maliketh's Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Mushroom Arms
How to Acquire:
Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.
 Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Noble's Gloves
How to Acquire:
The Noble's Gloves along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
How to Acquire:
Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Robe and Omenkiller Boots. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Iron Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Perfumer Gloves
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Preceptor's Gloves
How to Acquire:
Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Queen's Bracelets
How to Acquire:
Queen's Bracelets can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 
Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

name: Radahn's Gauntlets
How to Acquire: The Radahn's Gauntlets Armor Gauntlets can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

name: Raging Wolf Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Can be dropped by Raya Lucaria Knights.        Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Scaled Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan.
 Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Sorcerer Manchettes
How to Acquire: They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Traveling Maiden Gloves
How to Acquire:
On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Twinned Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.
Elden Ring Map here        Obtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

name: Warrior Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.        Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria). 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.        Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Veteran's Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after killing Commander Niall at Castle Sol Rooftop.

name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
How to Acquire: The Vulgar Militia Gauntlets Armor Gauntlets piece can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

name: White Reed Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Zamor Bracelets
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

name: Battlemage Manchettes
How to Acquire:
This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.        The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. 
Elden Ring Map Link.

name: Blaidd's Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Silver Bracelets
How to Acquire: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.        One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Brave's Bracer
How to Acquire: The Brave's Bracer Armor Gauntlets piece is currently unobtainable.

name: Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

name: Depraved Perfumer Gloves
How to Acquire: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle

name: Drake Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Elden Ring Map here        Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

name: Eccentric's Manchettes
How to Acquire:
This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Fingerprint Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Prelate Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates.        One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.        One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

name: Godskin Noble Bracelets
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Gold Bracelets
How to Acquire:
Gold Bracelets can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Golden Prosthetic
How to Acquire: Currently Unobtainable.

name: Guardian Bracers
How to Acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from the Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.        An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.

name: Haligtree Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Drops from Haligtree Knights, they can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Leather Gloves
How to Acquire:
Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Lusat's Manchettes
How to Acquire:
All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to occupy.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Malenia's Gauntlet
How to Acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella.

name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.        An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces are dropped by Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.

name: Millicent's Gloves
How to Acquire: The Millicent's Gloves Armor Gauntlets piece is not currently obtainable.

name: Night's Cavalry Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Nox Bracelets
How to Acquire: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

name: Omen Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Radahn Soldier Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Chace to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

name: Ragged Gloves
How to Acquire: Not currently obtainable.

name: Redmane Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael.

name: Ronin's Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
Acquired by following Yura's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Royal Knight Gauntlets
How to Acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Royal Knight Lorreta for  4000.

name: Royal Remains Gauntlets
Special Effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.
How to Acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

name: Spellblade's Gloves
Special Effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
How to Acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

name: Traveler's Gloves
How to Acquire:
Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveler's Manchettes
How to Acquire:
Just before fighting Malenia, at the Haligtree Roots site of grace in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, there is a side room with a large blooming red flower. Melina's Set pieces are looted in front of the flower. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Tree Sentinel Gauntlets
How to Acquire:
See the Tree Sentinel Set page for a guide on how to attain the set.
Elden Ring Map here

name: War Surgeon Gloves
How to Acquire: Dropped by killing one of three nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off.
